translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新たなる魔王様か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A new Demon Lord, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの下よりは楽しめそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems like it will be more enjoyable than under Kabeerus."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聞けば魔王様は人間の頃より、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hear that since he was human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刃向かう者は殺す、女は犯す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he kills those who oppose him and defiles women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼畜、邪悪で名を馳せたらしいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was notorious as a fiend and evil man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがまことなら素晴らしい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's true, how wonderful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら魔物の王に相応しいではありませんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doesn't it make him worthy of being our King of Demons?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間だった頃より、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even when he was human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ様を始めとする数名の魔人を従え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he commanded several demons, including Lady Satera,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何体もの魔人を倒してきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and defeated many demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このような偉業、歴史上で初。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a feat is the first in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさしく歴代最強、魔王になるべくして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is truly the strongest ever, appearing just to become the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世に現れたお方と言ってもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say he is the one who came into this world to be the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、素晴らしい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, wonderful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのような方と共に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To walk the golden age of demons with such a person...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の黄金時代を歩めるとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is truly an honor..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……早く、早く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... soon, very soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間界にまた攻め込みたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to invade the human world again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひそひそと囁き合う魔物達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance surveyed the demons whispering quietly among themselves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが見渡し、一度頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and nodded once.
"Alright..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、新魔王として全魔物に命じる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, as the new Demon Lord, I command all demons:"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全ての魔物に緊張が走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tension ran through all the demons present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、そこに嫌な感覚はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there was no unpleasant feeling there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな魔王が最初に何を命じるのか期待を膨らませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were excited and curious about what the new Demon Lord would command first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな記念すべき場に居合わせたことに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and felt an emotion akin to excitement at being part of such a memorable event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高揚にも似た感情を抱く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They felt a kind of exhilaration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、俺が魔王となった以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, now that I have become the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対のルールを一つ設ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will set one absolute rule.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはなにかと言うと……――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what is that...—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間も魔物も問わず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regardless of human or demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世の美女はぜーんぶ俺様のものってことだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the beauties in this world are mine!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめぇらの略奪や戦争行為、一切を禁じる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All your looting and acts of war are strictly forbidden!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全員、魔物界の奥地に引っ込んでるように！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, retreat deep into the demon world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以上だー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーーーーーっ！？！？！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhhhhh!?!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく大戦争が始まると思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought a great war would finally start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今度の魔王様は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time, the Demon Lord...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう方だったかぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that kind of person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなびっくりしてる、びっくりしてる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone's so surprised, so surprised!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　これでよし！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! This will do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいアカメ、ここは世界の頂点か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey Akame, is this the pinnacle of the world?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、今、貴方がおられる場所が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the place where you stand now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方がこれまでの行いで上り詰めた場所」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the place you climbed to through all your deeds."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この地上に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On this earth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の貴方より偉い者はいません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no one greater than you now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が世界で、もっとも偉い男！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the greatest man in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様、いっちばーーーーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm number oooone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、ベズドグ山という所を攻めるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, we will attack a place called Mount Bezdog."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面舵いっぱい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hard right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これよりランス城はベズドグ山を目指ーーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Rance Castle will head towards Mount Bezdog!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、分かりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes, understood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちなみに根拠を伺っても？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way, may I ask what your basis is?"
"A hunch."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A new Demon Lord, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの下よりは楽しめそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seems like it will be more enjoyable than under Kabeerus."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hear that since he was human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刃向かう者は殺す、女は犯す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he kills those who oppose him and defiles women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼畜、邪悪で名を馳せたらしいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was notorious as a fiend and evil man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがまことなら素晴らしい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's true, how wonderful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら魔物の王に相応しいではありませんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doesn't it make him worthy of being our King of Demons?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間だった頃より、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even when he was human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ様を始めとする数名の魔人を従え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he commanded several demons, including Lady Satera,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何体もの魔人を倒してきた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and defeated many demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このような偉業、歴史上で初。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a feat is the first in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさしく歴代最強、魔王になるべくして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is truly the strongest ever, appearing just to become the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世に現れたお方と言ってもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say he is the one who came into this world to be the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、素晴らしい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, wonderful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのような方と共に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To walk the golden age of demons with such a person...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の黄金時代を歩めるとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is truly an honor..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……早く、早く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... soon, very soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間界にまた攻め込みたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to invade the human world again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひそひそと囁き合う魔物達を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance surveyed the demons whispering quietly among themselves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが見渡し、一度頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and nodded once.
"Alright..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、新魔王として全魔物に命じる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, as the new Demon Lord, I command all demons:"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全ての魔物に緊張が走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tension ran through all the demons present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、そこに嫌な感覚はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there was no unpleasant feeling there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たな魔王が最初に何を命じるのか期待を膨らませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were excited and curious about what the new Demon Lord would command first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな記念すべき場に居合わせたことに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and felt an emotion akin to excitement at being part of such a memorable event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高揚にも似た感情を抱く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They felt a kind of exhilaration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、俺が魔王となった以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, now that I have become the Demon Lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対のルールを一つ設ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will set one absolute rule.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはなにかと言うと……――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what is that...—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間も魔物も問わず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regardless of human or demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世の美女はぜーんぶ俺様のものってことだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the beauties in this world are mine!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめぇらの略奪や戦争行為、一切を禁じる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All your looting and acts of war are strictly forbidden!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全員、魔物界の奥地に引っ込んでるように！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone, retreat deep into the demon world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以上だー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーーーーーっ！？！？！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehhhhhh!?!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかく大戦争が始まると思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought a great war would finally start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今度の魔王様は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time, the Demon Lord...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう方だったかぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that kind of person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなびっくりしてる、びっくりしてる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone's so surprised, so surprised!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　これでよし！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! This will do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいアカメ、ここは世界の頂点か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey Akame, is this the pinnacle of the world?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、今、貴方がおられる場所が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the place where you stand now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方がこれまでの行いで上り詰めた場所」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the place you climbed to through all your deeds."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この地上に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On this earth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の貴方より偉い者はいません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no one greater than you now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が世界で、もっとも偉い男！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the greatest man in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様、いっちばーーーーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm number oooone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、ベズドグ山という所を攻めるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, we will attack a place called Mount Bezdog."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面舵いっぱい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hard right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これよりランス城はベズドグ山を目指ーーす！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Rance Castle will head towards Mount Bezdog!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、分かりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes, understood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちなみに根拠を伺っても？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way, may I ask what your basis is?"
"A hunch."
